title: The PreLibraryPrep GET Response Schema
description: The schema for the GET response to retrieve an array of PreLibraryPrep
$comment: A request is retrieved into three different parts. The data, links and the meta data.

data.$comment: This is where the data of the request is found, containing an array of all of the PreLibraryPrep.
data.description: Each element is a PreLibraryPrep object, the number of elements can range from 1, for a specific query, or all instances in the database.

id.$comment: The id will be displayed here to the user instead of as an attribute.
id.description: Id reference to this PreLibraryPrep, generated by the application.

type.$comment: The type of object the data will be returned.
type.description: The type of data being returned.

relationships.$comment: Contains all of the relationships that is possible with PreLibraryPrep objects.
relationships.description: Contains all of the relationships for a specific PreLibraryPrep.

protocol.description: The related API call links to retrieve Protocol from this specific PreLibraryPrep.

product.description: The related API call links to retrieve Product from this specific PreLibraryPrep.

meta.$comment: Metadata that comes along with the request.

totalResourceCount.description: Meta info describing how many elements are in the data array returned.
